snippet: Trapped in New Orleans during Hurricane Katrina, this novel’s young hero teams up with an aging musician and a feisty girl.
abstract: Thomas Beller reviews book Zane and the Hurricane: A Story of Katrina by Rodman Philbrick.
lead_paragraph: Trapped in New Orleans during Hurricane Katrina, this novel’s young hero teams up with an aging musician and a feisty girl.

headline.seo: ‘Zane and the Hurricane,’ by Rodman Philbrick
